meanings.definition: The reappearance of a trait in an organism after several generations of absence.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the atavisms in the plant, noticing how an old trait suddenly came back.
meanings.sent2: The atavisms in the animal population showed how traits from long ago could resurface.
meanings.sent3: The atavisms in the family's pet made everyone laugh as it started behaving like its ancestors.
meanings.sent4: The atavisms of the ancient tree made it seem like a living link to the past.
meanings.sent5: The atavisms of the flower were so striking that they captured the botanist's attention.
